name: Suzanne Evans

jv_history.source_quote: that Driven Inc. fills … that actual “implement the right solution and partner with you over time” gap. If you’re looking to skyrocket your reach and revenue, Driven Inc. can provide you with a plan.

what_you_do: Provides world class training on speaking, selling from the stage, and events to help business owners grow their businesses fast.
who_you_serve: Business owners looking to start or grow their business using speaking and selling from the stage.
social_proof: NY Times best selling author, only female business coach to make the INC 500/5000 for five consecutive years in a row, over $75 million in personal sales from stages, guided students to earn over $700 million from their own stages, founded in 2008
signature_programs: The Speaker's Launchpad (free mini course), High Ticket Sales Training, Speaker Training, Driven Performance (featuring Olympic Champion Marion Jones), Elite Business Scaling Mentorship, Second Wind Podcast
business_focus: Teaching business owners to use speaking and selling from the stage for 6-7 figure paydays.
service_provided: Speaker training, high ticket sales training, elite business scaling mentorship, performance coaching, live and virtual events
